sentence: Right now, what you say about the enemy and saying Putin is an intelligent actor or there are reasons why he wanted to protect his flank no, there wasn't.? McCrory also takes issue with North Carolina GOP Rep. Madison Cawthorn calling Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky a "thug" at a town hall and with President Joe Biden's initial dismissiveness of the Russians possibly invading Ukraine.

title: McCrory on why he is still standing despite both Club for Growth and Trump against him

sentence: Now I have to go to North Carolina and campaign for Thom Tillis's primary opponent because Donald Trump and Madison Cawthorn are more popular with the grassroots in North Carolina than Thom Tillis will ever be, never mind the other RINO there, Richard Burr.

sentence: Unfortunately, Madison Cawthorn has fallen well short of the most basic standards Western North Carolina expects from their representatives, and voters now have several well-qualified candidates to choose from who would be a significant improvement,? Tillis said.

sentence: Representative Madison Cawthorn, a North Carolina Republican, is facing backlash from his state's two GOP senators after multiple recent controversieswith one senator deciding to back his primary challenger.

title: GOP Senators From Madison Cawthorn's State Won't Back His Re-Election Bid

sentence: Rep. Madison Cawthorn, R-N.C., has seen his support among members of his party evaporate after salacious claims he made about being invited to sex parties and witnessing drug use on Capitol Hill.

sentence: Rep. Madison Cawthorn's (R-N.C.) unfounded allegations of being invited to orgies in Washington and seeing people do cocaine is prompting condemnation from his state's GOP senators, House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy (Calif.) and other Republicans.

sentence: Several Republican Party leaders in North Carolina are backing Rep. Madison Cawthorn's primary challenger following the congressman's claims that he had witnessed "sexual perversion" and drug use among his Congress colleagues.
